Sql.query: insert into trn_modelo( trnmodcodi, trnmodnombre, emprcodi, trnmoduseins, trnmodfecins) values( :trnmodcodi, :trnmodnombre, :emprcodi, :trnmoduseins, :trnmodfecins )
update trn_modelo set trnmodnombre = :trnmodnombre, emprcodi = :emprcodi, trnmoduseact = :trnmoduseact, trnmodfecact = :trnmodfecact where trnmodcodi = :trnmodcodi

select mo.trnmodcodi, mo.trnmodnombre, mo.emprcodi, mo.trnmoduseins, mo.trnmodfecins, mo.trnmoduseact, mo.trnmodfecact, em.emprnomb from trn_modelo mo inner join si_empresa em on (mo.emprcodi = em.emprcodi) order by mo.trnmodnombre

select mo.trnmodcodi, mo.trnmodnombre, mo.emprcodi, mo.trnmoduseins, mo.trnmodfecins, mo.trnmoduseact, mo.trnmodfecact, em.emprnomb from trn_modelo mo inner join si_empresa em on (mo.emprcodi = em.emprcodi) where mo.emprcodi = :emprcodi order by mo.trnmodnombre
select trnmodcodi, trnmodnombre from trn_modelo order by trnmodnombre

insert into trn_modelo_retiro( trnmrecodi, trnmodcodi, barrcodi, coresocodi, coresocodigo, trnmodretuseins, trnmodretfecins) values( :trnmrecodi, :trnmodcodi, :barrcodi, :coresocodi, :coresocodigo, :trnmodretuseins, :trnmodretfecins )

update trn_modelo_retiro set trnmodcodi = :trnmodcodi, barrcodi = :barrcodi, coresocodi = :coresocodi, coresocodigo = :coresocodigo, trnmodretuseact = :trnmodretuseact, trnmodretfecact = :trnmodretfecact where trnmrecodi = :trnmrecodi

select more.trnmrecodi, more.trnmodcodi, more.barrcodi, more.coresocodi, more.coresocodigo, more.trnmodretuseins, --more.trnmodretfecins, --more.trnmodretuseact, --more.trnmodretfecact, bar.barrbarratransferencia, emp.emprnomb as trnmodretuseact, ret.coresofechainicio as trnmodretfecins, ret.coresofechafin as trnmodretfecact from trn_modelo_retiro more inner join trn_barra bar on (more.barrcodi = bar.barrcodi) inner join trn_codigo_retiro_solicitud ret on (more.coresocodi = ret.coresocodi) inner join si_empresa emp on (ret.genemprcodi = emp.emprcodi) where more.trnmodcodi = :trnmodcodi order by bar.barrbarratransferencia
select barrcodi, barrbarratransferencia from trn_barra order by barrbarratransferencia
select coresocodi, coresocodigo from trn_codigo_retiro_solicitud where coresoestado in ('ACT','ASI') and coresoobservacion = 'SOLBAJANO' and barrcodi = :barrcodi order by coresofechainicio desc
select count(trnmrecodi) as nroregistros from trn_modelo_retiro where trnmodcodi = :trnmodcodi
